alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:33PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN PERSHING COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM PDT... At 430 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms across northern Pershing County. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oreana, Imlay, Unionville, Old Razorback Mountain, Seven Troughs Mountain, Rye Patch Reservoir, Dry Mountain, Star Peak, Mount Tobin, Majuba Mountain, Mill City, McKinney Pass, Rye Patch Reservoir Campground, Organ Peak, and Rosebud Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy rainfall and gusty winds will also impact portions of Interstate 80 between Lovelock and Winnemucca, with blowing dust possibly reducing visibility at times.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
